			.header-clone{

	display: inline-block;

/*2022*/

/*fonts*/
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap');

/* p text - overriding theme CSS - but don't type p or all white p text will change sitewide */
.elementor-page .elementor-widget-text-editor,
.elementor-page li.elementor-icon-list-item {
  color: #3c5462;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

h1, h2 {
  font-size: 36px;
}

/*LINK TEXT - will affect button text and social icons if you remove the p*/
p A:link, A:visited, A:active {color: #43baff;}
p A:hover {color: #9cba60;} 


/*all text in table cells*/
td {text-align: center;}




/*keep social icons white even after visited*/
a.share-facebook,
a.share-linkedin,
a.share-twitter,
a.share-email
{
  color: #fff !important;
}


/* main menu nav */
body {
  font-family: "Nunito Sans", sans-serif;
}



/*scientist quote text*/
blockquote, cite {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif !important;
}

/*allows quote color to be local*/
blockquote {
  color: inherit;
}

/*quote quottion mark*/
blockquote::before {
  color: #fff;
}





/*caption text - force remove horizontal scrolling*/
pre {
  background: #eee;
	font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
}

.breadcrumbs {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}
.breadcrumbs li a {
	color: #bfdfff !important;
}
.breadcrumbs li a:hover {
	color: #fff!important;
}

	

/* force homepage icon-boxes (What I Need to Do) to all same height with a custom id inseerted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-home .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 27em !important;
}

/* force alphacare icon-boxes to all same height with a custom id inserted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-alphacare .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 18em;
}

/*homepage flip box headlines - alpha at work custom id*/
#alpha-at-work .support-box .inner-box .content-box h3
{bottom: 0;
background: #004a9890;
font-size: 18px;
padding: .5em;
}



/* force timeline divs to all same height*/
.slick-slide div.indus-item div.item-inner{
	min-height: 15em;
	background:#fff;
padding: 45px 45px 45px 95px;
}

/*timeline images*/
.ot-industries img
{width: 9em;}

/*force timeline nav dots on same line*/
.slick-dots li {
  display: inline-grid;
}




/* subpage header breadcrumb blue background area*/
.page-header {
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 250px;
}

/* breadcrumb arrows*/
.page-header .breadcrumbs li::before {
	color: #43baff;
}

/* subpage subheader white h2 text in the blue area*/
.subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1.3em;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 800px) {
  .subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1em;
}}


/* checkmarks in alphcare pricing table lists*/
.ot-pricing-table .inner-table .details ul li.active::before {
  color: #43baff;
}



/*portfolio grid text persistent*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
	opacity: 1;
}

/*portfolio grid text div*/
.portfolio-info-inner{
	background: rgba(15, 38, 63, 0.6);
}

/*keep portfolio grid boxes same height*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box{
	height: 18em;
}

/*portfolio grid image color overlay*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
background: rgba(160, 160, 160, 0.17);
}
/*portfolio grid img hover*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box:hover img {
  -webkit-transform: scale(1.15);
  -ms-transform: scale(1.15);
  transform: scale(1.15);
  filter: contrast(1.5);
}



/*Hide blog author box on articles - not here, go to Customize > Blog > Single Post*/


/*blog author image
.author-image img.avatar.avatar-250.photo{
  max-width: 50%;
	}*/




/*Blog grid page - 2 entries per row*/
.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 400px;
	margin-right: 25px;
}

.site-main {    
	  display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

/*Blog grid - headlines*/
.post-box .entry-title a {
  color: #004a98;
  text-decoration: none;
}
	
	

/*Google Maps - WP Maps Pro plugin - doesn't appear to have an effect here - manage in the plugin instead*/
.fc-item-box {
		font-family: "Noto Sans", sans-serif !important;
}

.fc-item-primary-text-color {
	color: #004a98 !important;
}

.fc-item-body-text-color {
	color: #7897ab !important;
}


/*Force the Elementor Heading element to display h1-h6 correctly*/

div.elementor-widget-heading.elementor-widget-heading .elementor-heading-title {
	  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h3.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 30px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h6.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

/*Hide unexpected WPML search box appearing at bottom of homepage for each language page - wait, it hides on blog page too*/

/* 
section#block-2.widget.widget_block.widget_search
{
    display: none !important;
  }*/


/*Display Mobile Menu at 1090px */
@media only screen and (max-width: 1090px) {
  .header-desktop {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-mobile {
    display: block !important;
  }
}







/*2023 Blog Page Update*/
.container-fluid.fluid-margins {
	  padding-left: 45px;
    padding-right: 45px;
}

.widget-area.primary-sidebar {
	    border-right: 3px solid #E6E6E6;
}

.post-box .entry-title a {
	color: #43BAFF
}

.entry-meta .posted-on a{
	color: #707070 !important;
}

.blog-main {
	justify-content: center;
}

.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 350px !important;
}

.post-box .entry-title {
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.entry-summary.the-excerpt {
	max-height: 113px;
    overflow-y: hidden;
	  line-height: 25px;
    font-size: 12px;
}
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	height: 350px
}
/*
.flex-box-pagination {
	    flex-basis: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
*/

.break {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  height: 0;
}

.post-inner .entry-media {
	display: none;
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	padding: 30px 45px 26px;
	min-height: 375px;
}

.post-box:hover {
	    box-shadow: none;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
    -moz-box-shadow: none
}

.post-inner:hover {
	    box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -moz-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.excerpt-author {
	color: #004A98;
    font-style: italic;
}

/*Fixing the Jotform sidebar on scroll*/

.fixed {
  position: fixed;
  top: 180px;
	right: 335px;
	max-width: 300px;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1700px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:250px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1500px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:150px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1250px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:50px;
	}

		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="13575" class="elementor elementor-13575 elementor-7469" data-elementor-post-type="ot_portfolio">
									<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-1f8d917 ot-traditional elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="1f8d917" data-element_type="section">

				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<style>/*! elementor - v3.15.0 - 20-08-2023 */

				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-afb4626 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="afb4626" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-8eedd7b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="8eedd7b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">定容样品切割……每个样品，每次。</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e343053 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="e343053" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p>坏样本可能是测试环境中最可避免的错误来源。 每次测试的样本量和形状不一致可能会给您的结果带来不必要的变化。 这是因为扭矩受模具距离或距离的影响——体积的变化会变成数据的变化。 Alpha 经行业验证的定容样品切割器提供两种简单的解决方案来确保样品相同——一种用于流变仪，一种用于门尼粘度计。 精确、准确的样品制备意味着您的数据更可靠。 这提高了您设定更严格规格和交付卓越最终产品的能力。</p>						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-28410af elementor-widget elementor-widget-otsocialshare" data-id="28410af" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="otsocialshare.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<div class="otf-social-share clearfix shape-circle"><a class="share-facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%25a0%25b7%25e5%2593%2581%25e5%2588%2587%25e5%2589%25b2%25e5%2599%25a8%2F" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a><a class="share-twitter" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%E6%A0%B7%E5%93%81%E5%88%87%E5%89%B2%E5%99%A8&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%25a0%25b7%25e5%2593%2581%25e5%2588%2587%25e5%2589%25b2%25e5%2599%25a8%2F&via=Alpha Technologies | Rheologists and Engineers" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a><a class="share-linkedin" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%25a0%25b7%25e5%2593%2581%25e5%2588%2587%25e5%2589%25b2%25e5%2599%25a8%2F&title=%E6%A0%B7%E5%93%81%E5%88%87%E5%89%B2%E5%99%A8" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a><a class="share-email" href="mailto:?Subject=%E6%A0%B7%E5%93%81%E5%88%87%E5%89%B2%E5%99%A8&Body=I%20saw%20this%20and%20thought%20of%20you!%20 https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%25a0%25b7%25e5%2593%2581%25e5%2588%2587%25e5%2589%25b2%25e5%2599%25a8%2F"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i></a></div>		</div>
				</div>

		</div>
							</div>
		</section>
				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-e7b85f9 ot-traditional elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="e7b85f9" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
					<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-a3842e3 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="a3842e3" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-0e329a8 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="0e329a8" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p><strong>Alpha 的样品切割</strong>器可在几秒钟内生产出恒定体积的橡胶样品。 对于流变仪和粘度计测试的可重复性至关重要的 MDR、RPA 和 MV 仪器，定容样品是理想的选择。 有两种样品切割器可供选择，样品可以完美地放入相应的样品托盘中。</p><p><strong>双作用气动样品压机</strong>——在几秒钟内获得橡胶样品。</p><p><strong>紧凑的尺寸</strong>– 非常适合有效利用工作台空间和仪器放置。</p><p><strong>双手安全触摸开关</strong>——利用光学传感器，需要两只手来激活机器。 这提高了操作员的安全性，并且不需要防护罩。</p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-caebb21 ot-column-items-center ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="caebb21" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">

样品切割器.content: Alpha 的样品切割器可在几秒钟内生产出恒定体积的橡胶样品。 对于流变仪和粘度计测试的可重复性至关重要的 MDR、RPA 和 MV 仪器，定容样品是理想的选择。 有两种样品切割器可供选择，样品可以完美地放入相应的样品托盘中。双作用气动样品压机——在几秒钟内获得橡胶样品。紧凑的尺寸– 非常适合有效利用工作台空间和仪器放置。双手安全触摸开关——利用光学传感器，需要两只手来激活机器。 这提高了操作员的安全性，并且不需要防护罩。

电气：100/240 VAC，50/60 Hz，最大 10 瓦
空气压力： 83 至 115 psi（5.6 至 8.0 kg/cm2）
方面： 宽 28 厘米（11 英寸），高 55 厘米（21.8 英寸），深 34 厘米（13.4 英寸）
外壳尺寸： 70 x 48 x 70 厘米
重量：净重 35 公斤（77 磅），毛重 53 公斤（117 磅）

/*2022*/

/*fonts*/
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap');

/* p text - overriding theme CSS - but don't type p or all white p text will change sitewide */
.elementor-page .elementor-widget-text-editor,
.elementor-page li.elementor-icon-list-item {
  color: #3c5462;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

h1, h2 {
  font-size: 36px;
}

/*LINK TEXT - will affect button text and social icons if you remove the p*/
p A:link, A:visited, A:active {color: #43baff;}
p A:hover {color: #9cba60;} 


/*all text in table cells*/
td {text-align: center;}




/*keep social icons white even after visited*/
a.share-facebook,
a.share-linkedin,
a.share-twitter,
a.share-email
{
  color: #fff !important;
}


/* main menu nav */
body {
  font-family: "Nunito Sans", sans-serif;
}



/*scientist quote text*/
blockquote, cite {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif !important;
}

/*allows quote color to be local*/
blockquote {
  color: inherit;
}

/*quote quottion mark*/
blockquote::before {
  color: #fff;
}





/*caption text - force remove horizontal scrolling*/
pre {
  background: #eee;
	font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
}

.breadcrumbs {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}
.breadcrumbs li a {
	color: #bfdfff !important;
}
.breadcrumbs li a:hover {
	color: #fff!important;
}

	

/* force homepage icon-boxes (What I Need to Do) to all same height with a custom id inseerted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-home .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 27em !important;
}

/* force alphacare icon-boxes to all same height with a custom id inserted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-alphacare .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 18em;
}

/*homepage flip box headlines - alpha at work custom id*/
#alpha-at-work .support-box .inner-box .content-box h3
{bottom: 0;
background: #004a9890;
font-size: 18px;
padding: .5em;
}



/* force timeline divs to all same height*/
.slick-slide div.indus-item div.item-inner{
	min-height: 15em;
	background:#fff;
padding: 45px 45px 45px 95px;
}

/*timeline images*/
.ot-industries img
{width: 9em;}

/*force timeline nav dots on same line*/
.slick-dots li {
  display: inline-grid;
}




/* subpage header breadcrumb blue background area*/
.page-header {
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 250px;
}

/* breadcrumb arrows*/
.page-header .breadcrumbs li::before {
	color: #43baff;
}

/* subpage subheader white h2 text in the blue area*/
.subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1.3em;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 800px) {
  .subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1em;
}}


/* checkmarks in alphcare pricing table lists*/
.ot-pricing-table .inner-table .details ul li.active::before {
  color: #43baff;
}



/*portfolio grid text persistent*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
	opacity: 1;
}

/*portfolio grid text div*/
.portfolio-info-inner{
	background: rgba(15, 38, 63, 0.6);
}

/*keep portfolio grid boxes same height*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box{
	height: 18em;
}

/*portfolio grid image color overlay*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
background: rgba(160, 160, 160, 0.17);
}
/*portfolio grid img hover*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box:hover img {
  -webkit-transform: scale(1.15);
  -ms-transform: scale(1.15);
  transform: scale(1.15);
  filter: contrast(1.5);
}



/*Hide blog author box on articles - not here, go to Customize > Blog > Single Post*/


/*blog author image
.author-image img.avatar.avatar-250.photo{
  max-width: 50%;
	}*/




/*Blog grid page - 2 entries per row*/
.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 400px;
	margin-right: 25px;
}

.site-main {    
	  display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

/*Blog grid - headlines*/
.post-box .entry-title a {
  color: #004a98;
  text-decoration: none;
}
	
	

/*Google Maps - WP Maps Pro plugin - doesn't appear to have an effect here - manage in the plugin instead*/
.fc-item-box {
		font-family: "Noto Sans", sans-serif !important;
}

.fc-item-primary-text-color {
	color: #004a98 !important;
}

.fc-item-body-text-color {
	color: #7897ab !important;
}


/*Force the Elementor Heading element to display h1-h6 correctly*/

div.elementor-widget-heading.elementor-widget-heading .elementor-heading-title {
	  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h3.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 30px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h6.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

/*Hide unexpected WPML search box appearing at bottom of homepage for each language page - wait, it hides on blog page too*/

/* 
section#block-2.widget.widget_block.widget_search
{
    display: none !important;
  }*/


/*Display Mobile Menu at 1090px */
@media only screen and (max-width: 1090px) {
  .header-desktop {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-mobile {
    display: block !important;
  }
}







/*2023 Blog Page Update*/
.container-fluid.fluid-margins {
	  padding-left: 45px;
    padding-right: 45px;
}

.widget-area.primary-sidebar {
	    border-right: 3px solid #E6E6E6;
}

.post-box .entry-title a {
	color: #43BAFF
}

.entry-meta .posted-on a{
	color: #707070 !important;
}

.blog-main {
	justify-content: center;
}

.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 350px !important;
}

.post-box .entry-title {
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.entry-summary.the-excerpt {
	max-height: 113px;
    overflow-y: hidden;
	  line-height: 25px;
    font-size: 12px;
}
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	height: 350px
}
/*
.flex-box-pagination {
	    flex-basis: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
*/

.break {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  height: 0;
}

.post-inner .entry-media {
	display: none;
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	padding: 30px 45px 26px;
	min-height: 375px;
}

.post-box:hover {
	    box-shadow: none;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
    -moz-box-shadow: none
}

.post-inner:hover {
	    box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -moz-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.excerpt-author {
	color: #004A98;
    font-style: italic;
}

/*Fixing the Jotform sidebar on scroll*/

.fixed {
  position: fixed;
  top: 180px;
	right: 335px;
	max-width: 300px;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1700px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:250px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1500px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:150px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1250px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:50px;
	}
}		</style>

				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-6b5c2f11 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="6b5c2f11" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-9f4eddf elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="9f4eddf" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">这不是我们的第一个 MDR。</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3d25efbe elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="3d25efbe" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p>一开始……嗯，实际上不久前<em>，</em>但还有一段时间……摆盘式流变仪 (ODR) 不仅是首选仪器，而且是<em>唯一</em>选择。 它仅限于大约一项测试。 这就是 Alpha Technologies（当时称为 Monsanto Rubber Chemicals）的工程师和科学家开始工作并改变行业的原因。 他们发明了移动模流变仪——MDR：用于全球橡胶和聚合物工厂流变测试的主力固化仪。</p><p>如今，Premier® MDR 引入了新技术，与所有其他动模流变仪相比，该技术可提供具有最高一致性和长期稳定性的数据。 Premier MDR 提供可靠、可重复的数据，批次符合 ISO 6502 和 ASTM D5289 标准和要求。 可重复性还意味着您的数据在全球范围内从仪器到仪器、从工厂到工厂始终可重现。 您的数据不会因为您的时区而改变。</p><p>Premier MDR 是定制设计和制造的，可承受任何连续生产环境。 事实上，我们早期的许多 MDR 在 20、30、40 年后仍在工作。 这就是为什么 Alpha 比任何其他品牌都受到更多顶级橡胶和聚合物制造商的信任。</p>						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7d8591ff elementor-widget elementor-widget-otsocialshare" data-id="7d8591ff" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="otsocialshare.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<div class="otf-social-share clearfix shape-circle"><a class="share-facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mdr%2F" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a><a class="share-twitter" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86+MDR&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mdr%2F&via=Alpha Technologies | Rheologists and Engineers" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a><a class="share-linkedin" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mdr%2F&title=%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86+MDR" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a><a class="share-email" href="mailto:?Subject=%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86+MDR&Body=I%20saw%20this%20and%20thought%20of%20you!%20 https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mdr%2F"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i></a></div>		</div>

					<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-da08d1e ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="da08d1e" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-98126c3 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="98126c3" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-8bb3957 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="8bb3957" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1865f30 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="1865f30" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<blockquote>“该领域有很多 Premier MDR 的逆向工程副本。他们缺乏的是我们的专有设计和工程、我们的高性能电子设备以及我们对可追溯标准的承诺。这就是它们价格较低的原因，我们对此表示同意。我们的竞争对手知道他们的乐器值多少钱。”
 </blockquote>						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d859cfb elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="d859cfb" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p>– <strong>John Dick</strong> ，Alpha Technologies 流变学研究员</p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>

		</section>
				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-5a752fa elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle ot-traditional elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="5a752fa" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-no">
					<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-633ab84 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="633ab84" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7b0ba75 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="7b0ba75" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">如何将 Premier MDR 与所有其他人进行比较。</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5600528 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="5600528" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p><strong>更硬的密封件具有低摩擦，可防止滑动和泄漏，并确保不会丢失信号</strong>。 另外，它们的使用寿命更长。</p><p><strong>油饱和推力轴承</strong>使用寿命更长，无需润滑，整体维护成本更低。</p><p><strong>标准压力传感器</strong>允许测量泡沫性能以确定压力是否通过测量发生变化。 这使您能够优化配方并减少错误。</p><p> </p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-54ecf42 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="54ecf42" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c486244 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="c486244" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
							</div>
		</section>
				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ada4991 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle ot-traditional elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="ada4991" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-no">
					<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-93cf63b ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="93cf63b" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-237e970 elementor-widget elementor-widget-spacer" data-id="237e970" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="spacer.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
					<div class="elementor-spacer">
			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
				</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-338f077 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="338f077" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a783547 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="a783547" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p><strong>独立的触摸屏用户界面</strong>——用于仪器管理的工作台和用于数据分析的在线管理器。 我们的定制电子设备为您提供真正的多任务处理。 与其他人使用的缓慢 PLC 不同，无需等待测试完成即可查看数据。</p><p><strong>您可以信赖的扭矩标准。</strong> Alpha 致力于可追溯的扭矩标准，以确保您的仪器得到准确校准。 其他人使用更便宜的扭矩标准（他们不喜欢分发），这些标准具有不可接受的误差范围，并且需要捏造因素才能使它们“正确”出来。</p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
							</div>
		</section>
				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-c450f0d elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="c450f0d" data-element_type="section" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
							<div class="elementor-background-overlay"></div>
							<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-extended">
					<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-c043e4b ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="c043e4b" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c73284b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="c73284b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">从您的 Premier MDR 中获得更多价值</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d48a9d9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="d48a9d9" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h6 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">扩展 Premier MDR 功能的选项。</h6>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-285c09b elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="285c09b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p><strong>Rapid Change™</strong>偏心轮无需校准即可简单快速地改变摆动角度（0.2、0.5、1、3 和 7.17 度）。 我们以一个多小时的优势击败了比赛！</p><p><strong>智能密封™。</strong> 可选的上模组件可消除传统的弹性密封件，同时保持封闭的加压腔，以提高长期数据稳定性并减少对扭矩校准的需求。</p><p><strong>轻松自动化。 </strong>我们的 3 侧开放式外壳可以轻松添加多种自动化选项，以支持小批量到大批量生产需求。 我们紧凑、轻便的样品输送系统提供业内最可靠的样品传输系统。</p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-1674044 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="1674044" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">

                    <div id="custom-electronics-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="custom-electronics-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" class="alignright wp-image-6473 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />Faster. Better Control. Better Resolution.</h4>
<strong>Custom Electronics that are matched to the instrument</strong>. Better control. Better resolution. Other RPAs use off-the-shelf PLCs to save money, but can’t fine-tune their electronics to their instrument – often overshoot set points then spend valuable time stabilizing.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="superior-die-cooling-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="superior-die-cooling-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="wp-image-6470 size-medium alignright" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-1024x683.jpg 1024w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900.jpg 1200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />Efficient Die Cooling</h4><p><strong>Efficient die cooling that gets your instrument ready for the next test.</strong> Why wait 20 minutes for dies to cool down when Premier instruments take about 6 minutes. (And our instruments are smart enough to know when the instrument reaches the right temperature. Others, not so much.)</p>				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="better-heating-control-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="better-heating-control-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-10068 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />

Custom Designed Heating Control System</h4>
<strong>Because they are designed specifically for Premier instruments,</strong> our heating control system ramps up heating cycles faster and maintains control for more accurate cure times and more efficient production.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="always-aligned-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="always-aligned-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="wp-image-6475 size-medium alignright" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-200x300.jpg" alt="" width="200" height="300" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-200x300.jpg 200w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-683x1024.jpg 683w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-768x1152.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-720x1080.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 200px) 100vw, 200px" />

Dynamic Symmetry and Smart Alignment</h4>
<strong>More accurate measurements.</strong> No loss of signal thanks to Premier’s Smart Alignment and Dynamic Symmetry. On-target, parallel die closing, high stiffness and constant closing force.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="cast-aluminum-frame-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="cast-aluminum-frame-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-6472 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-224x300.jpg" alt="" width="224" height="300" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-224x300.jpg 224w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-766x1024.jpg 766w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-768x1027.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-720x962.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 224px) 100vw, 224px" />

Lighter. Stronger. Stiffer.</h4>
<strong>Work smarter not harder with lighter, cast aluminum frames.</strong> Not only are Premier frames light, but incredibly stiff for less variability. What’s more, Premier instruments incorporate frame compliance into the calibration for better data.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="touch-screen-easy-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="touch-screen-easy-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-6476 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-1024x683.jpg 1024w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900.jpg 1200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />

Control with a Personal Touch</h4>
<strong>Our incredibly intuitive user interface</strong> comes to you through a large, bright, touch screen panel that lets you navigate to the view you want or the information you need, fast and easy.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="storage-drawer-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="storage-drawer-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-6474 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />

Storage Drawer</h4>
Okay… that’s a really small thing. But QA and R&D technicians love having a way to keep their workspace clear.				                            </div>

Premier MDR.content: 如何将 Premier MDR 与所有其他人进行比较。更硬的密封件具有低摩擦，可防止滑动和泄漏，并确保不会丢失信号。 另外，它们的使用寿命更长。油饱和推力轴承使用寿命更长，无需润滑，整体维护成本更低。标准压力传感器允许测量泡沫性能以确定压力是否通过测量发生变化。 这使您能够优化配方并减少错误。独立的触摸屏用户界面——用于仪器管理的工作台和用于数据分析的在线管理器。 我们的定制电子设备为您提供真正的多任务处理。 与其他人使用的缓慢 PLC 不同，无需等待测试完成即可查看数据。您可以信赖的扭矩标准。 Alpha 致力于可追溯的扭矩标准，以确保您的仪器得到准确校准。 其他人使用更便宜的扭矩标准（他们不喜欢分发），这些标准具有不可接受的误差范围，并且需要捏造因素才能使它们“正确”出来。从您的 Premier MDR 中获得更多价值扩展 Premier MDR 功能的选项。Rapid Change™偏心轮无需校准即可简单快速地改变摆动角度（0.2、0.5、1、3 和 7.17 度）。 我们以一个多小时的优势击败了比赛！智能密封™。 可选的上模组件可消除传统的弹性密封件，同时保持封闭的加压腔，以提高长期数据稳定性并减少对扭矩校准的需求。轻松自动化。 我们的 3 侧开放式外壳可以轻松添加多种自动化选项，以支持小批量到大批量生产需求。 我们紧凑、轻便的样品输送系统提供业内最可靠的样品传输系统。

频率：100 cpm (1.67 赫兹)
温度范围：环境温度为 446°F (230°C)
拉紧：0.5 标准（7%）； 0.2、1.0、3.0 和 7.17 度
(2.8%、14%、42% 或 100%) 可用 ML、MH、MH-ML、Ts1、Ts2、
在船上：T10、T50、T90、S？ 在 ML，S? 在 MH、TD 在 ML、TD 在 MH、最大固化速率、最大固化速率时间、压力点 PH-PL 和压力时间点
测试标准：符合 ASTM D5289、ISO6502 和 DIN 53529
电气：100/110/120/130 VAC+/- 10%, 60 +/- 3Hz, 10amp, 单相 200,220,240,260 VAC +/-10%, 50Hz +/- 3amp 单相
空气压力：最低 60 psi (414Kpa, 4.2 kg/cm2)
方面：宽：22 英寸（56 厘米），深：26 英寸（66 厘米），高：48 英寸（122 厘米）
重量：净重 350 磅（159 公斤）
液晶触摸屏：155mm x 85mm，分辨率 800 x 480

Faster. Better Control. Better Resolution.Custom Electronics that are matched to the instrument. Better control. Better resolution. Other RPAs use off-the-shelf PLCs to save money, but can’t fine-tune their electronics to their instrument – often overshoot set points then spend valuable time stabilizing.Efficient Die CoolingEfficient die cooling that gets your instrument ready for the next test. Why wait 20 minutes for dies to cool down when Premier instruments take about 6 minutes. (And our instruments are smart enough to know when the instrument reaches the right temperature. Others, not so much.Because they are designed specifically for Premier instruments, our heating control system ramps up heating cycles faster and maintains control for more accurate cure times and more efficient production.More accurate measurements. No loss of signal thanks to Premier’s Smart Alignment and Dynamic Symmetry. On-target, parallel die closing, high stiffness and constant closing force.Work smarter not harder with lighter, cast aluminum frames. Not only are Premier frames light, but incredibly stiff for less variability. What’s more, Premier instruments incorporate frame compliance into the calibration for better data.Our incredibly intuitive user interface comes to you through a large, bright, touch screen panel that lets you navigate to the view you want or the information you need, fast and easy.Okay… that’s a really small thing. But QA and R&D technicians love having a way to keep their workspace clear.)

			.header-clone{
	height: 100px!important;
}
.elementor-widget-wrap>.elementor-element.btn-inline{
	display: inline-block;
	width: auto;
}
.elementor-3872 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4cff60df .elementor-icon-list-item span, .elementor-3872 .elementor-element.elementor-element-5e3bed1f .elementor-icon-list-item span {

}

.page-id-4899 #back-to-top{

/*2022*/

/*fonts*/
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap');

/* p text - overriding theme CSS - but don't type p or all white p text will change sitewide */
.elementor-page .elementor-widget-text-editor,
.elementor-page li.elementor-icon-list-item {
  color: #3c5462;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

h1, h2 {
  font-size: 36px;
}

/*LINK TEXT - will affect button text and social icons if you remove the p*/
p A:link, A:visited, A:active {color: #43baff;}
p A:hover {color: #9cba60;} 


/*all text in table cells*/
td {text-align: center;}




/*keep social icons white even after visited*/
a.share-facebook,
a.share-linkedin,
a.share-twitter,
a.share-email
{
  color: #fff !important;
}


/* main menu nav */
body {
  font-family: "Nunito Sans", sans-serif;
}



/*scientist quote text*/
blockquote, cite {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif !important;
}

/*allows quote color to be local*/
blockquote {
  color: inherit;
}

/*quote quottion mark*/
blockquote::before {
  color: #fff;
}





/*caption text - force remove horizontal scrolling*/
pre {
  background: #eee;
	font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
}

.breadcrumbs {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}
.breadcrumbs li a {
	color: #bfdfff !important;
}
.breadcrumbs li a:hover {
	color: #fff!important;
}

	

/* force homepage icon-boxes (What I Need to Do) to all same height with a custom id inseerted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-home .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 27em !important;
}

/* force alphacare icon-boxes to all same height with a custom id inserted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-alphacare .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 18em;
}

/*homepage flip box headlines - alpha at work custom id*/
#alpha-at-work .support-box .inner-box .content-box h3
{bottom: 0;
background: #004a9890;
font-size: 18px;
padding: .5em;
}



/* force timeline divs to all same height*/
.slick-slide div.indus-item div.item-inner{
	min-height: 15em;
	background:#fff;
padding: 45px 45px 45px 95px;
}

/*timeline images*/
.ot-industries img
{width: 9em;}

/*force timeline nav dots on same line*/
.slick-dots li {
  display: inline-grid;
}




/* subpage header breadcrumb blue background area*/
.page-header {
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 250px;
}

/* breadcrumb arrows*/
.page-header .breadcrumbs li::before {
	color: #43baff;
}

/* subpage subheader white h2 text in the blue area*/
.subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1.3em;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 800px) {
  .subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1em;
}}


/* checkmarks in alphcare pricing table lists*/
.ot-pricing-table .inner-table .details ul li.active::before {
  color: #43baff;
}



/*portfolio grid text persistent*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
	opacity: 1;
}

/*portfolio grid text div*/
.portfolio-info-inner{
	background: rgba(15, 38, 63, 0.6);
}

/*keep portfolio grid boxes same height*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box{
	height: 18em;
}

/*portfolio grid image color overlay*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
background: rgba(160, 160, 160, 0.17);
}
/*portfolio grid img hover*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box:hover img {
  -webkit-transform: scale(1.15);
  -ms-transform: scale(1.15);
  transform: scale(1.15);
  filter: contrast(1.5);
}



/*Hide blog author box on articles - not here, go to Customize > Blog > Single Post*/


/*blog author image
.author-image img.avatar.avatar-250.photo{
  max-width: 50%;
	}*/




/*Blog grid page - 2 entries per row*/
.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 400px;
	margin-right: 25px;
}

.site-main {    
	  display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

/*Blog grid - headlines*/
.post-box .entry-title a {
  color: #004a98;
  text-decoration: none;
}
	
	

/*Google Maps - WP Maps Pro plugin - doesn't appear to have an effect here - manage in the plugin instead*/
.fc-item-box {
		font-family: "Noto Sans", sans-serif !important;
}

.fc-item-primary-text-color {
	color: #004a98 !important;
}

.fc-item-body-text-color {
	color: #7897ab !important;
}


/*Force the Elementor Heading element to display h1-h6 correctly*/

div.elementor-widget-heading.elementor-widget-heading .elementor-heading-title {
	  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h3.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 30px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h6.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

/*Hide unexpected WPML search box appearing at bottom of homepage for each language page - wait, it hides on blog page too*/

/* 
section#block-2.widget.widget_block.widget_search
{
    display: none !important;
  }*/


/*Display Mobile Menu at 1090px */
@media only screen and (max-width: 1090px) {
  .header-desktop {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-mobile {
    display: block !important;
  }
}







/*2023 Blog Page Update*/
.container-fluid.fluid-margins {
	  padding-left: 45px;
    padding-right: 45px;
}

.widget-area.primary-sidebar {
	    border-right: 3px solid #E6E6E6;
}

.post-box .entry-title a {
	color: #43BAFF
}

.entry-meta .posted-on a{
	color: #707070 !important;
}

.blog-main {
	justify-content: center;
}

.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 350px !important;
}

.post-box .entry-title {
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.entry-summary.the-excerpt {
	max-height: 113px;
    overflow-y: hidden;
	  line-height: 25px;
    font-size: 12px;
}
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	height: 350px
}
/*
.flex-box-pagination {
	    flex-basis: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
*/

.break {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  height: 0;
}

.post-inner .entry-media {
	display: none;
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	padding: 30px 45px 26px;
	min-height: 375px;
}

.post-box:hover {
	    box-shadow: none;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
    -moz-box-shadow: none
}

.post-inner:hover {
	    box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -moz-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.excerpt-author {
	color: #004A98;
    font-style: italic;
}

/*Fixing the Jotform sidebar on scroll*/

.fixed {
  position: fixed;
  top: 180px;
	right: 335px;
	max-width: 300px;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1700px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:250px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1500px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:150px;
	}
}

		right:50px;
	}

				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-6b5c2f11 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="6b5c2f11" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6e0520b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="6e0520b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">每个人都有一个。</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3d25efbe elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="3d25efbe" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p>当梅尔文穆尼创造粘度计时，他几乎不知道他的计算和以他的名字命名的仪器会在橡胶和聚合物世界中无处不在。 但是，我们确实认为他会认可 Alpha Technologies 自那时以来在开发我们的 Premier® MV 时所做的设计和工程改进。</p><p>Premier MV 采用全新的紧凑型设计，是执行三项关键橡胶和聚合物测试的经济高效的方法：</p><ul><li>门尼粘度</li><li>穆尼应力松弛</li><li>穆尼焦烧</li></ul><p>Premier MV 的增强功能和改进的功能对于需要在其产品系列中添加全功能粘度计的公司来说意味着一件事——Premier MV 为您提供更多的钱。</p>						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7d8591ff elementor-widget elementor-widget-otsocialshare" data-id="7d8591ff" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="otsocialshare.default">

			<div class="otf-social-share clearfix shape-circle"><a class="share-facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mv%2F" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a><a class="share-twitter" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86+MV&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mv%2F&via=Alpha Technologies | Rheologists and Engineers" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a><a class="share-linkedin" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mv%2F&title=%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86+MV" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a><a class="share-email" href="mailto:?Subject=%E6%80%BB%E7%90%86+MV&Body=I%20saw%20this%20and%20thought%20of%20you!%20 https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e6%2580%25bb%25e7%2590%2586-mv%2F"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i></a></div>		</div>

				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<blockquote><p>是的，如果您只需要一个门尼测试来验证您的材料，您可以使用更便宜的仪器。 您还将获得更多的可变性、更少的可靠性和更慢的测试周期。 所以我认为成本/收益比显然有利于 Premier MV。”</p></blockquote>						</div>

				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5600528 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="5600528" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p><strong>卓越的模具冷却和温度稳定性</strong>——得益于轻量模具和专有的数字温度控制，Premier MV 提供了出色的温度稳定性，与以前的型号相比，模具冷却时间减少了 45%。 你的粘度计能做到吗？</p><p><strong>多速测量</strong>– 控制多个剪切速率以建立幂律曲线和其他剪切粘度图。</p><p><strong>转子对齐检测</strong>——通过关闭未对齐的转子来防止对转子和轴的意外损坏，并减少更换转子和轴所需的时间和成本。</p><p><strong>自动静重校准</strong>——允许在几秒钟内校准仪器。</p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
							</div>
		</section>
				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-c450f0d elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="c450f0d" data-element_type="section" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">

				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p><strong>高级验证程序</strong>——确保您满足 ASTM 规定的设定点。</p><p><strong>标准多区应力松弛和变速数字电机</strong>——对于获取高级处理信息（例如识别触变材料）至关重要。</p><p><strong>可选的长寿命 O 型圈</strong>– 通过减少频繁的清洁和校准，让您的仪器长时间工作。</p><p> </p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>

                    <div id="custom-electronics-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="custom-electronics-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" class="alignright wp-image-6473 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Custom-electronics_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />Faster. Better Control. Better Resolution.</h4>
<strong>Custom Electronics that are matched to the instrument</strong>. Better control. Better resolution. Other RPAs use off-the-shelf PLCs to save money, but can’t fine-tune their electronics to their instrument – often overshoot set points then spend valuable time stabilizing.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="superior-die-cooling-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="superior-die-cooling-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="wp-image-6470 size-medium alignright" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-1024x683.jpg 1024w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Advance-die-cooling_900.jpg 1200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />Efficient Die Cooling</h4><p><strong>Efficient die cooling that gets your instrument ready for the next test.</strong> Why wait 20 minutes for dies to cool down when Premier instruments take about 6 minutes. (And our instruments are smart enough to know when the instrument reaches the right temperature. Others, not so much.)</p>				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="better-heating-control-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="better-heating-control-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-10068 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Better-heating-control_Alpha-Tech_211130_0128_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />

Custom Designed Heating Control System</h4>
<strong>Because they are designed specifically for Premier instruments,</strong> our heating control system ramps up heating cycles faster and maintains control for more accurate cure times and more efficient production.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="always-aligned-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="always-aligned-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="wp-image-6475 size-medium alignright" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-200x300.jpg" alt="" width="200" height="300" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-200x300.jpg 200w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-683x1024.jpg 683w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-768x1152.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900-720x1080.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Dynamic-Symmetry-alignment_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 200px) 100vw, 200px" />

Dynamic Symmetry and Smart Alignment</h4>
<strong>More accurate measurements.</strong> No loss of signal thanks to Premier’s Smart Alignment and Dynamic Symmetry. On-target, parallel die closing, high stiffness and constant closing force.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="cast-aluminum-frame-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="cast-aluminum-frame-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-6472 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-224x300.jpg" alt="" width="224" height="300" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-224x300.jpg 224w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-766x1024.jpg 766w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-768x1027.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900-720x962.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Cast-aluminum-frame_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 224px) 100vw, 224px" />

Lighter. Stronger. Stiffer.</h4>
<strong>Work smarter not harder with lighter, cast aluminum frames.</strong> Not only are Premier frames light, but incredibly stiff for less variability. What’s more, Premier instruments incorporate frame compliance into the calibration for better data.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="touch-screen-easy-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="touch-screen-easy-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-6476 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-1024x683.jpg 1024w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Touch-screen_900.jpg 1200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />

Control with a Personal Touch</h4>
<strong>Our incredibly intuitive user interface</strong> comes to you through a large, bright, touch screen panel that lets you navigate to the view you want or the information you need, fast and easy.				                            </div>
		        
                    <div id="storage-drawer-tab" class="clearfix eael-tab-content-item inactive" data-title-link="storage-drawer-tab">
				        					        <h4><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignright wp-image-6474 size-medium" style="margin-bottom: 1em;" src="https://alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900-720x480.jpg 720w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Drawer_900.jpg 900w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" />

Storage Drawer</h4>
Okay… that’s a really small thing. But QA and R&D technicians love having a way to keep their workspace clear.				                            </div>

Premier MDR.content: 如何将 Premier MV 与所有其他人进行比较。卓越的模具冷却和温度稳定性——得益于轻量模具和专有的数字温度控制，Premier MV 提供了出色的温度稳定性，与以前的型号相比，模具冷却时间减少了 45%。 你的粘度计能做到吗？多速测量– 控制多个剪切速率以建立幂律曲线和其他剪切粘度图。转子对齐检测——通过关闭未对齐的转子来防止对转子和轴的意外损坏，并减少更换转子和轴所需的时间和成本。自动静重校准——允许在几秒钟内校准仪器。高级验证程序——确保您满足 ASTM 规定的设定点。标准多区应力松弛和变速数字电机——对于获取高级处理信息（例如识别触变材料）至关重要。可选的长寿命 O 型圈– 通过减少频繁的清洁和校准，让您的仪器长时间工作。

频率： 100 cpm (1.67 赫兹)
温度范围： 环境温度为 446°F (230°C)
拉紧： 0.5 标准（7%）； 0.2、1.0、3.0 和 7.17 度
(2.8%、14%、42% 或 100%) 可用 ML、MH、MH-ML、Ts1、Ts2、
在船上： T10、T50、T90、S？ 在 ML，S? 在 MH、TD 在 ML、TD 在 MH、最大固化速率、最大固化速率时间、压力点 PH-PL 和压力时间点
测试标准： 符合 ASTM D5289、ISO6502 和 DIN 53529
电气： 100/110/120/130 VAC+/- 10%, 60 +/- 3Hz, 10amp, 单相 200,220,240,260 VAC +/-10%, 50Hz +/- 3amp 单相
空气压力： 最低 60 psi (414Kpa, 4.2 kg/cm2)
方面： 宽：22 英寸（56 厘米），深：26 英寸（66 厘米），高：48 英寸（122 厘米）
重量： 净重 350 磅（159 公斤）
液晶触摸屏： 155mm x 85mm，分辨率 800 x 480

Faster. Better Control. Better Resolution.Custom Electronics that are matched to the instrument. Better control. Better resolution. Other RPAs use off-the-shelf PLCs to save money, but can’t fine-tune their electronics to their instrument – often overshoot set points then spend valuable time stabilizing.Efficient Die CoolingEfficient die cooling that gets your instrument ready for the next test. Why wait 20 minutes for dies to cool down when Premier instruments take about 6 minutes. (And our instruments are smart enough to know when the instrument reaches the right temperature. Others, not so much.)Custom Designed Heating Control SystemBecause they are designed specifically for Premier instruments, our heating control system ramps up heating cycles faster and maintains control for more accurate cure times and more efficient production.Dynamic Symmetry and Smart AlignmentMore accurate measurements. No loss of signal thanks to Premier’s Smart Alignment and Dynamic Symmetry. On-target, parallel die closing, high stiffness and constant closing force.Lighter. Stronger. Stiffer.Work smarter not harder with lighter, cast aluminum frames. Not only are Premier frames light, but incredibly stiff for less variability. What’s more, Premier instruments incorporate frame compliance into the calibration for better data.Control with a Personal TouchOur incredibly intuitive user interface comes to you through a large, bright, touch screen panel that lets you navigate to the view you want or the information you need, fast and easy.Storage DrawerOkay… that’s a really small thing. But QA and R&D technicians love having a way to keep their workspace clear.

			.header-clone{
	height: 100px!important;
}

	display: inline-block;
	width: auto;
}
.elementor-3872 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4cff60df .elementor-icon-list-item span, .elementor-3872 .elementor-element.elementor-element-5e3bed1f .elementor-icon-list-item span {

}

.page-id-3872 #back-to-top{

/*2022*/

/*fonts*/
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400;1,700&display=swap');

/* p text - overriding theme CSS - but don't type p or all white p text will change sitewide */
.elementor-page .elementor-widget-text-editor,
.elementor-page li.elementor-icon-list-item {
  color: #3c5462;
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

h1, h2 {
  font-size: 36px;
}

/*LINK TEXT - will affect button text and social icons if you remove the p*/
p A:link, A:visited, A:active {color: #43baff;}
p A:hover {color: #9cba60;} 


/*all text in table cells*/
td {text-align: center;}




/*keep social icons white even after visited*/
a.share-facebook,
a.share-linkedin,
a.share-twitter,
a.share-email
{
  color: #fff !important;
}


/* main menu nav */
body {
  font-family: "Nunito Sans", sans-serif;
}



/*scientist quote text*/
blockquote, cite {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif !important;
}

/*allows quote color to be local*/
blockquote {
  color: inherit;
}

/*quote quottion mark*/
blockquote::before {
  color: #fff;
}





/*caption text - force remove horizontal scrolling*/
pre {
  background: #eee;
	font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
}

.breadcrumbs {
  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
}
.breadcrumbs li a {
	color: #bfdfff !important;
}
.breadcrumbs li a:hover {
	color: #fff!important;
}

	

/* force homepage icon-boxes (What I Need to Do) to all same height with a custom id inseerted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-home .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 27em !important;
}

/* force alphacare icon-boxes to all same height with a custom id inserted in the row*/
#force-box-heights-alphacare .icon-box-s2 {
  min-height: 18em;
}

/*homepage flip box headlines - alpha at work custom id*/
#alpha-at-work .support-box .inner-box .content-box h3
{bottom: 0;
background: #004a9890;
font-size: 18px;
padding: .5em;
}



/* force timeline divs to all same height*/
.slick-slide div.indus-item div.item-inner{
	min-height: 15em;
	background:#fff;
padding: 45px 45px 45px 95px;
}

/*timeline images*/
.ot-industries img
{width: 9em;}

/*force timeline nav dots on same line*/
.slick-dots li {
  display: inline-grid;
}




/* subpage header breadcrumb blue background area*/
.page-header {
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 250px;
}

/* breadcrumb arrows*/
.page-header .breadcrumbs li::before {
	color: #43baff;
}

/* subpage subheader white h2 text in the blue area*/
.subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1.3em;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 800px) {
  .subpage-subheader.elementor-widget.elementor-widget-heading div.elementor-widget-container h2.elementor-heading-title.elementor-size-default{
	font-size:1em;
}}


/* checkmarks in alphcare pricing table lists*/
.ot-pricing-table .inner-table .details ul li.active::before {
  color: #43baff;
}



/*portfolio grid text persistent*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
	opacity: 1;
}

/*portfolio grid text div*/
.portfolio-info-inner{
	background: rgba(15, 38, 63, 0.6);
}

/*keep portfolio grid boxes same height*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box{
	height: 18em;
}

/*portfolio grid image color overlay*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box .portfolio-info {
background: rgba(160, 160, 160, 0.17);
}
/*portfolio grid img hover*/
.projects-style-1 .projects-box:hover img {
  -webkit-transform: scale(1.15);
  -ms-transform: scale(1.15);
  transform: scale(1.15);
  filter: contrast(1.5);
}



/*Hide blog author box on articles - not here, go to Customize > Blog > Single Post*/


/*blog author image
.author-image img.avatar.avatar-250.photo{
  max-width: 50%;
	}*/




/*Blog grid page - 2 entries per row*/
.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 400px;
	margin-right: 25px;
}

.site-main {    
	  display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

/*Blog grid - headlines*/
.post-box .entry-title a {
  color: #004a98;
  text-decoration: none;
}
	
	

/*Google Maps - WP Maps Pro plugin - doesn't appear to have an effect here - manage in the plugin instead*/
.fc-item-box {
		font-family: "Noto Sans", sans-serif !important;
}

.fc-item-primary-text-color {
	color: #004a98 !important;
}

.fc-item-body-text-color {
	color: #7897ab !important;
}


/*Force the Elementor Heading element to display h1-h6 correctly*/

div.elementor-widget-heading.elementor-widget-heading .elementor-heading-title {
	  font-family: 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #004a98;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h3.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 30px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

.elementor-widget-heading h6.elementor-heading-title {
    font-size: 18px;
	line-height: 1.2;
}

/*Hide unexpected WPML search box appearing at bottom of homepage for each language page - wait, it hides on blog page too*/

/* 
section#block-2.widget.widget_block.widget_search
{
    display: none !important;
  }*/


/*Display Mobile Menu at 1090px */
@media only screen and (max-width: 1090px) {
  .header-desktop {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .header-mobile {
    display: block !important;
  }
}







/*2023 Blog Page Update*/
.container-fluid.fluid-margins {
	  padding-left: 45px;
    padding-right: 45px;
}

.widget-area.primary-sidebar {
	    border-right: 3px solid #E6E6E6;
}

.post-box .entry-title a {
	color: #43BAFF
}

.entry-meta .posted-on a{
	color: #707070 !important;
}

.blog-main {
	justify-content: center;
}

.post-box .post-inner {
	max-width: 350px !important;
}

.post-box .entry-title {
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 24px;
}

.entry-summary.the-excerpt {
	max-height: 113px;
    overflow-y: hidden;
	  line-height: 25px;
    font-size: 12px;
}
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	height: 350px
}
/*
.flex-box-pagination {
	    flex-basis: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
*/

.break {
  flex-basis: 100%;
  height: 0;
}

.post-inner .entry-media {
	display: none;
}

.post-box .inner-post {
	padding: 30px 45px 26px;
	min-height: 375px;
}

.post-box:hover {
	    box-shadow: none;
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
    -moz-box-shadow: none
}

.post-inner:hover {
	    box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -webkit-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 10%);
    -moz-box-shadow: 15px 15px 38px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

.excerpt-author {
	color: #004A98;
    font-style: italic;
}

/*Fixing the Jotform sidebar on scroll*/

.fixed {
  position: fixed;
  top: 180px;
	right: 335px;
	max-width: 300px;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1700px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:250px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1500px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:150px;
	}
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1250px) {
	
	.fixed {
		right:50px;
	}
}		</style>

			<style>/*! elementor - v3.15.0 - 20-08-2023 */

				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-6b5c2f11 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="6b5c2f11" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-53a0982 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="53a0982" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">测量高性能材料的下一个前沿。 我们处于领先地位。</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3d25efbe elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="3d25efbe" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p>Alpha 的 Premier ESR® 专为下一代高性能材料而设计。 发现使用 Premier ESR 的好处的行业包括：</p><ul><li>热塑性塑料</li><li>热塑性弹性体</li><li>热固性塑料</li><li>电子线路板</li><li>飞机</li><li>复合材料</li><li>大学</li></ul><p>Premier ESR 能够测试各种样品，包括树脂、粉末、颗粒、液体和预浸料。</p><p>Premier ESR 使用等温或非等温温度程序测量固化性能。 这可以通过比较不同配方、批次或不同老化程度的结果来精确表征材料。</p><p>由于 ESR 固化样品与您的成品部件由相同的材料（预浸料）制成，因此测试可以精确地实时模拟与您的工艺相同的温度程序。 这意味着在较长的固化周期中与生产同时进行测试有助于确保在更有效的时间内完全固化。 此外，ESR 中的可保留试样可用于更多测试，包括 DMA、TMA 和部分固化状态证明。</p>						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7d8591ff elementor-widget elementor-widget-otsocialshare" data-id="7d8591ff" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="otsocialshare.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<div class="otf-social-share clearfix shape-circle"><a class="share-facebook" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e9%25ab%2598%25e7%25ba%25a7-esr%2F" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-facebook-f"></i></a><a class="share-twitter" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=%E9%AB%98%E7%BA%A7+ESR&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e9%25ab%2598%25e7%25ba%25a7-esr%2F&via=Alpha Technologies | Rheologists and Engineers" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-twitter"></i></a><a class="share-linkedin" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e9%25ab%2598%25e7%25ba%25a7-esr%2F&title=%E9%AB%98%E7%BA%A7+ESR" target="_blank"><i class="fab fa-linkedin-in"></i></a><a class="share-email" href="mailto:?Subject=%E9%AB%98%E7%BA%A7+ESR&Body=I%20saw%20this%20and%20thought%20of%20you!%20 https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alpha-technologies.com%2Fzh-hans%2Finstruments%2F%25e9%25ab%2598%25e7%25ba%25a7-esr%2F"><i class="fa fa-envelope"></i></a></div>		</div>

				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-3fca49f elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle ot-traditional elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="3fca49f" data-element_type="section">

			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">

				<div class="elementor-widget-container">

			<div class="elementor-spacer-inner"></div>
		</div>
				</div>
				</div>

		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-8bb3957 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="8bb3957" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1865f30 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="1865f30" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<blockquote><p>我们花了很多时间询问复合材料和树脂行业的同事，他们需要什么来更好地测量他们的固化材料。 然后我们开始着手创建 Premier ESR。 该仪器的许多新想法和新功能都来自我们自己的科学家和工程师。 但很多想法也来自我们的客户。”<br><cite></cite></p></blockquote>						</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-7107285 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="7107285" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							– <strong>Dung Nguyen</strong> ，电气工程师						</div>
				</div>

		</section>
				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-5a752fa elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle ot-traditional elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="5a752fa" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-no">
					<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-633ab84 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="633ab84" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ae92338 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="ae92338" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
			<h3 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">如何将 Premier ESR 与所有其他人进行比较。</h3>		</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5600528 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="5600528" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
							<p>实际上，这比您想象的要难。 虽然许多公司提供昂贵、技术复杂且测试时间过高的 DMA 仪器，但 Alpha Technologies 还是推出了 Premier ESR。 Alpha 的 Premier ESR 符合 ASTM D7750。 它提供了一种在任何必要的固化周期下固化复合材料的经济有效的方法。 此外，ESR 能够根据这些条件测量凝胶、固化和最终物理特性。</p><p>（顺便说一下，为了享受一点轻松的阅读乐趣，请查看 Alpha 的流变学研究员 H. Pawlowski 撰写的<a href="https://www.nasampe.org/store/viewproduct.aspx?id=9281022&hhSearchTerms=%22%22Improving+the+measurement+of+prepreg" target="_blank" rel="noopener">“使用封装样品流变仪改进预浸料粘度、凝胶和固化的测量”</a> ，可通过 SAMPE 北美 2017 年会议在西雅图获得。 )</p><p>也就是说，Premier ESR 带有许多标准功能，当您考虑购买 ESR 时，这些功能很重要。</p>						</div>
				</div>
					</div>
		</div>
				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-54ecf42 ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="54ecf42" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">

				<section data-particle_enable="false" data-particle-mobile-disabled="false" class="elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ada4991 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle ot-traditional elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-id="ada4991" data-element_type="section">

				<div class="elementor-column elementor-col-50 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-93c996c ot-flex-column-vertical" data-id="93c996c" data-element_type="column" data-settings="{"background_background":"classic"}">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
								<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-bbba152 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image" data-id="bbba152" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="image.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
															<img decoding="async" width="900" height="600" src="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Premier-ESR_Alpha-Tech_220127_4382_900.jpg" class="attachment-full size-full wp-image-9911" alt="Premier ESR prepreg samples" srcset="https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Premier-ESR_Alpha-Tech_220127_4382_900.jpg 900w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Premier-ESR_Alpha-Tech_220127_4382_900-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Premier-ESR_Alpha-Tech_220127_4382_900-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.alpha-technologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Premier-ESR_Alpha-Tech_220127_4382_900-720x480.jpg 720w" sizes="(max-width: 900px) 100vw, 900px" />															</div>
